app_detail:
Yatzy Dice Clash - Dice Game comes with an enhanced Yatzy gameplay core spiced up with collectible cards.

The traditional dice game will refresh your childhood memories and at the same time will wake up your competitive spirit!
With this gameplay experience, you can start your journey by building your deck of cards, and get an additional chance of luck while rolling the dice!
Online multiplayer dice game followed by simple dice game rules, also known as yatzee, yatze, yahsee or yatzy. 

The famous dice game takes you to another level with its new features. Upgrade your cards, customize your dice, create your deck of cards and roll the dice in one of the best dice games!
Challenge your buddies to play a match in a world tour and climb straight to the top!

Yatzy Dice Clash is a free Yatze game, however, some game items can also be purchased with real money.

FEATURES:
ğŸ† Challenge players from around the world and friends in real-time 
ğŸ… Win Silver, Gold, Royale and Grand Royale boxes from duels
ğŸ Open Yatzy boxes with Yatzee stars 
ğŸ’ªCollect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones in this multiplayer board game
ğŸ² Build and upgrade your deck of cards with buddies with dozens of your common, rare, epic or legendary favorite cards
ğŸ’¡ Create your ultimate Yatzy Lucky Charms Deck to boost your chance of luck
ğŸ” Discover new dice skins and customize your dice looks
ğŸ® Progress by playing in the world tours and become a world champion
ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘§ Invite your Facebook friends and challenge them to a duel
ğŸ Exchange gift boxes on a daily basis

*new features are coming soon!

Play against your worldwide friends, family and buddies and become a worldwide champion!
